abstract: Yahoo once again makes the case to shareholders that its existing directors are better equipped to lead the company forward than an alternate slate proposed by Carl Icahn.
snippet: Yahoo once again makes the case to shareholders that its existing directors are better equipped to lead the company forward than an alternate slate proposed by Carl Icahn.
lead_paragraph: In a new pitch to shareholders on Monday, Yahoo insisted that its current board was better prepared to lead the company than an alternate slate proposed by Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire investor who is leading a proxy fight to take control.

headline.main: Yahoo Makes New Pitch to Shareholders as Stock Drops Further
